Question: Shenzhen Aoni Electronic Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Aoni Electronic Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Aoni is a public company listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange since 2021 Dec.
- Aoni has more than 2500 workers, 230 R&D. It is a solution provider and manufacturer of smart cameras, such as battery cameras, floodlight cameras, doorbell cameras, indoor PT cameras, indoor cube IP camera, outdoor bullet cameras, and outdoor PTZ cameras, WiFi NVR kits, and Baby monitor.
- The software App is Tuya Smart Life, and Aoni also offers full OEM/ODM services for customized products, including housing design, product logo printing, custom packing, custom App UI, ID design, structure design, hardware and software development, cloud services, and testing processes.
